actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to establish a grant program to enable States to establish and maintain pilot drug testing and drug treatment programs for welfare recipients engaging in illegal drug use, and for other purposes.
short_title: Drug Testing and Treatment for Welfare Recipients Act of 1999
subjects: Federal aid to substance abuse programs

summary.text: Drug Testing and Treatment for Welfare Recipients Act of 1999 - Authorizes the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award grants to up to five States to establish and maintain pilot drug testing programs and drug treatment programs for welfare recipients. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Drug Testing and Treatment for Welfare Recipients Act of 1999

A bill to establish a grant program to enable States to establish and maintain pilot drug testing and drug treatment programs for welfare recipients engaging in illegal drug use, and for other purposes.
